trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un controllo editor che consente agli utenti finali di modificare diverse proprietà dell'interfaccia utente in un oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: La classe AppearanceEditorPart è un controllo editor che deriva dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>e viene utilizzata per modificare le proprietà che influiscono sull'aspetto di un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o un altro controllo server.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo AppearanceEditorPart consente agli utenti finali di modificare diverse proprietà dell'interfaccia utente di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di controllo che viene visualizzato nella pagina per modificare ogni valore della proprietà è elencato nella cella adiacente della tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set the text for the title.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| The AppearanceEditorPart control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Controllo utilizzato per modificare la proprietà | |--------------|-----------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>viene utilizzato per impostare il testo del titolo. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>viene utilizzato per selezionare il tipo di opzione di titolo e bordo utilizzato. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>viene utilizzato per selezionare la direzione di scorrimento del contenuto della pagina. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>viene utilizzato per impostare un numero per l'altezza e un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>viene utilizzato per selezionare le unità. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>viene utilizzato per impostare un numero per l'altezza e un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>viene utilizzato per selezionare le unità. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>| Un controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>viene utilizzato per indicare se il controllo è nascosto. | Il controllo AppearanceEditorPart diventa visibile solo quando una pagina Web part è in modalità di modifica e quando un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è stato selezionato per la modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo AppearanceEditorPart, come tutti gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, si trova in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>fuso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona può contenere solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli non possono essere inseriti in qualsiasi altro tipo di zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class has a minimal set of properties.
trans-unit.target: La classe AppearanceEditorPart dispone di un set minimo di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A> property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per ottenere o impostare una stringa che viene visualizzata come titolo quando il controllo è visibile.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A> property sets the inherited property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the AppearanceEditorPart control is the same as the default in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>Imposta la proprietà ereditata dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controllare, in modo che il controllo predefinito che riceve lo stato attivo all'interno del controllo AppearanceEditorPart è identico a quello predefinito nella base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class also has two important methods.
trans-unit.target: La classe di AppearanceEditorPart include inoltre due metodi importanti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>metodo esegue l'override del metodo base dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è fondamentale perché consente di ottenere i valori delle proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo che modifica e assegnarli ai campi nel controllo di editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>metodo inoltre è importante, poiché accetta i valori impostati dall'utente nei controlli di modifica e aggiorna tali valori delle proprietà del controllo in fase di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the AppearanceEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi il AppearanceEditorPart controllo deve essere utilizzato in un formato di persistenza pagina dichiarando un `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` elemento all'interno di un `<zonetemplate>` elemento, che a sua volta è contenuto in un `<asp:editorzone>` elemento in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare altre proprietà e comportamenti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, è possibile utilizzare gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli forniti con il set di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.
trans-unit.target: Questi controlli includono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornito <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli devono fornire la maggior parte delle funzionalità di modifica necessarie per modificare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i controlli, ma è anche possibile creare un controllo editor personalizzato ereditando dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di codice, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the AppearanceEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per migliorare l'accessibilità, viene eseguito il rendering del controllo AppearanceEditorPart all'interno di un `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the AppearanceEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Il `<fieldset>` elemento raggruppa il set correlato di controlli utilizzati per la modifica del controllo AppearanceEditorPart e facilita la navigazione a schede tra i controlli per visivo (come i normali browser Web) e gli agenti utente di riconoscimento vocale (ad esempio un software di lettura dello schermo).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Accessibilità markup sottoposto a rendering per impostazione predefinita per questo controllo potrebbe non essere conforme agli standard di accessibilità, ad esempio le linee guida priorità 1 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sul supporto di accessibilità per questo controllo, vedere [controlli ASP.NET e l'accessibilità](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva i valori di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato quando l'utente sceglie un pulsante che rappresenta un OK o Applica nell'interfaccia utente (UI) modifica.

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo del metodo consiste nel salvare i valori di un utente è impostato su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento il controllo associato in ereditato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges tenta di impostare le proprietà seguenti sull'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'azione di salvataggio dei valori di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo ha esito positivo; in caso contrario (se si verifica un errore), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being edited: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden*>
trans-unit.target: Si verifica un errore quando si impostano il valore di una delle seguenti proprietà per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo che viene modificato: <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *><>*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override della proprietà di base ereditata dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controllo per nascondere la proprietà dalle finestre di progettazione e impedire che venga modificata dai temi.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è pubblico, questa proprietà viene utilizzata per il rendering predefinito di questo controllo e non deve essere chiamato dal codice dello sviluppatore.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non può essere impostata da temi o temi di fogli di stile.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [ASP.NET temi e interfacce](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controllo che riceve lo stato attivo predefinito in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera i valori di proprietà da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllare e li assegna all'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo dalla classe di base, recupera i valori correnti da associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare e aggiorna i controlli nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo con tali valori in modo che un utente può modificarli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges viene chiamato ogni volta che i valori associati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo potrebbe essere state modificate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>area che contiene il controllo chiama il metodo SyncChanges, in modo che i valori di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllo sono sempre sincronizzate con i valori nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Un altro caso in cui viene chiamato il metodo SyncChanges è quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo passa alla modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un titolo per il controllo dell'editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà del titolo viene visualizzato nella barra del titolo di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controllare quando il controllo è visibile in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando il controllo viene dichiarato in una pagina, è possibile impostare un valore per il `Title` attributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il titolo, un valore specifico delle impostazioni cultura predefinito viene utilizzato per descrivere i tipi di proprietà che questo controllo consente agli utenti di modificare.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che viene utilizzata come il titolo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un nome di controllo calcolato fornito dal set di controlli Web part.
